issue.title: SubT CommsClient Can't handle ros namespaces

content.raw:
We’ve been using an instantiation of the subt comms client to handle communications, which does interface directly with the broker at times \(eg: line 308 in subt\_communication\_client.cpp “`return ros::service::call(kBrokerSrv, req, rep);”`\). Are we supposed to write our own version of this class that works with the relay instead? Or is the subt\_comms client only supposed to be interfacing with the relay and hasn’t been updated to do so?

‌

 I was able to get this approach “working” \(by which I mean two robots were communicating on my computer, but of course this wouldn’t work in the competition since I had to modify subt code\) by setting \_useIgnition=true and prepending the service calls with “/”.
